content.text:
[@daan2](@Bk5uzkFxdMJnJR+rKVd+X4LO/u+8VV+lA14e+XLabXQ=.ed25519) 

Comparing the [default ssb-server plugins](https://github.com/ssbc/ssb-server/blob/862660fa431b5544c5e0e5b8f779381a30ba9842/bin.js#L46-L61) with the [Patchwork plugins](https://github.com/ssbc/patchwork/blob/bfe4c2f20e46e4f73a77cee3945f8b8dc9ad55b1/server-process.js#L23-L43) it looks to me like this might be as simple as adding:

```js
.use(require('./plugins/plugins'))
```

I'm not sure, but if you can resolve it (and it works as expected) then I'd be happy to merge a PR for this. My intuition is that the plugin management plugin was removed because it _didn't_ work as expected, but I haven't spent any time looking into it.
